name: DEAD KNIGHT (Early shit)
description:
Your wife just killed you. Get all the way up to surface for some sweet revenge.

- Dead Knight is a Roguevania.

//Features

  • Action & Jumping Shit (AJS)
  • Perma....
  • Random generated world
  • Full Body and Soul Upgrades
  • Magic
  • 2 Different Points of View
  • 6 Different Level Types + Secret Floors
  • Several Bosses
  • And One Fucking Bitch

//Version 0.1

  • Very early test just to set the mood
  • Random dropables only
  • The shop and the elevator are useless
  • Only one floor
  • You can't enter the Boss Door. That's it.

* Alt+Enter - Fullscreen
